property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Harry Potter commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ernie MacMillon commits to a quest, choose a hero committed to that quest. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Seamus Finnegan suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ron Weasley gets +1 Û for each damage token on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Cedric Diggory participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Dean Thomas is committed to a quest, deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Luna Lovegood +1 Ò until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Exhaust Cho Chang to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then, discard that card, and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Oliver Wood can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so, he gets +1 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Neville Longbottom to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 resource from Hermione Grainger's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Ginny Weasley to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards. Limit once per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Filius Flitwick to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Prefect enters play, choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After First Year enters play, choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Dueling Instructor enters play, deal 1 damage to each Creature enemy in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Gryffindor hero you control leaves play, put Minerva McGonagall into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, all characters get +1 Û. All Gryffindor characters also get +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an ally card leaves play, that card's controller draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gains the Gryffindor trait.
Action: Exhaust Descendant of Peverell to add 2 resources to attached hero's resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gains +2 Ò.
If attached hero is Harry Potter, he also gains a Ê resource icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Hogwarts Spearman is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Rubeus Hagrid gains +5 Û until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase in which you trigger this effect, shuffle Rubeus Hagrid back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +1 Û and +1 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.
Action: Choose a player. That player's engaged enemies cannot attack that player this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gets +1 Û when attacking an Creature .
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 progress token on the current quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gains +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if attached hero is a Gryffindor.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character leaves play, add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Peeves to another player. Raise that player's threat by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Teacher commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on the active location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Auror commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Reduce one player's threat by 6, or reduce each player's threat by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to a location, exhaust a Ê character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that player's discard pile back into his deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any player's discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Return 1 Ê card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that card into play, under its owner's control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Time Turner to ready attached hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Healer to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Goblin Silversmith, return the topmost attachment in any player's discard pile to his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Sybill Trewlawney to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Gringotts Employee enters play, choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Myron Wagtail to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that location does not contribute its $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Look at the top X cards of any player's deck, add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand, and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to an enemy engaged with a player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Ú or +1 Ò until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 Ò.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Exhaust Prophecy to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Hospital Wing to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: At the end of the round, discard Albus Dumbledore from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Albus Dumbledore enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls. (2 characters instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Vampyr Mosp engages you, deal 5 damage to a single hero you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each character the defending player controls. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each character currently committed to a quest gets -1 Ò until the end of the phase.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 4. (Raise defending player's threat by 8 instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Each player must exhaust 1 hero he controls to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.
Response: After Hogwarts Mountains leaves play as an explored location, each player may search the top 5 cards of his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Shuffle the rest of the searched cards back into their owners' decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player discards all event cards in his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat level attaches this card to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero does not ready during the refresh phase unless you pay 2 resources from that hero's pool.")

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Manticore attacks the defending player. That player may declare 1 character as a defender. Deal Manticore its own Shadow card. After combat, return Manticore to the top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Excess combat damage dealt by Mountain Troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

property.name: Text
property.value:
During the encounter phase, players cannot optionally engage Dark Centaur if there are other enemies in the staging area.
Forced: If Dark Centaur is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player deals 1 point of damage to 1 character he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: Each time Horner Serpent attacks you, raise your threat by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: If Quintipeds is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Quintipeds to the staging area after it attacks.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove 4 progress tokens from the current quest card. (If there are fewer than 4 progress tokens on the quest, remove all progress tokens from that quest.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character does not count its Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the players travel to The Sahara Desert, place 1 progress token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Albania if there is no active location.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 character currently committed to a quest. Deal 2 damage to that character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tom Riddle get +2 Û for each resource token on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Tom Riddle attacks, place 1 resource token on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Bad Teacher attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each enemy and each location currently in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. If there are no cards in the staging area, Morsmordre gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment from the defending character. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: The first player must discard 2 cards from his hand at random to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Great Lake Shore is the active location, players cannot draw cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Aragog's Grandchild engages a player, it gets +1 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player must choose and discard 1 attachment he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (If this attack is undefended, also raise your threat by 3.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose 1 character currently committed to a quest, and remove that character from the quest. (The chosen character does not ready.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to the Forbidden Forest, the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to Forest Clearing, the first player may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: If Lucius Malfoy is in the staging area after the players have just quested unsuccessfully, shuffle 1 unclaimed objective card from the staging area back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments can be played on Guardian of Azkaban.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: When the prisoner is "rescued", move Guardian of Azkaban into the staging area.
Forced: After a shadow effect dealt to Guardian of Azkaban resolves, the engaged player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment you control. Discarded objective cards are returned to the staging area. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, raise the total $ in the staging area by X, where X is the number of players in the game.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by the number of enemies with which he is engaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach Fulgari to the top of the first player's deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from attached deck, discard Fulgari instead.")

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Resolve the "When Revealed" effect of Fulgari.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After travelling to Ministry Gate, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Ministry Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 Û, and 1 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Prophecy to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Prophecy to the staging area.)
Attached hero cannot attack or defend.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Magic Lantern to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Magic Lantern to the staging area.)
Forced: At the end of each round, raise attached hero's controller's threat by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Cursed Floo Powder to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Cursed Floo Powder to the staging area.)
Forced: At the end of each round, attached hero suffers 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Grindylows attacks, remove 1 progress token from the current quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (3 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal X shadow cards to this attacker. X is the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: If Banks of the Clyde River leaves play, return it to the top of the encounter deck instead of placing it in the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: While Queerditch Marsh is the active location, each player must raise his threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Cornish Pixies is defeated, shuffle it back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if defending player's threat is 35 or higher.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character controlled by each player with a threat of 35 or higher.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each character he controls that is not currently committed to a quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player chooses and returns 1 exhausted ally he controls to its owner's hand. If he controls no exhausted allies, raise his threat by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. Then, each player with a threat of 35 or higher chooses and discards 1 card from his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Aragog's Grandchild and 1 copy of the Forbidden Forest, and add them to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value: Forced: When you defeat this stage, proceed to one of the 2 "A Chosen Path" stages, at random.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Spider card of his choice, and add it to the staging area.
The players must find and defeat Aragog's Spawn to win this game.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value: Players cannot defeat this stage while Aragog's Spawn is in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for the 3 objective cards, reveal and place them in the staging area. Also, place the Guardian of Azkaban face up but out of play, alongside the quest deck. Then, shuffle the encounter deck, and attach 1 encounter to each objective card.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
When Revealed: Randomly select 1 hero card (among all the heroes controlled by the players) and turn it facedown. That hero is now considered a "prisoner", cannot be used, cannot be damaged, and does not collect resources, until it is "rescued" (as instructed by card effects) later in this quest.
The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.
Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have at least 1 objective card.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
Response: After placing any number of progress tokens on this card, flip the "prisoner" hero card face-up, and place 1 damage token on it. This hero has been "rescued", and may now be used by its controller.
The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.
Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have rescued the prisoner and have all 3 "Escape the Ministry" objective cards.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
Forced: At the beginning of each quest phase, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Ministry Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 Û, and 1 Ú.
Players cannot defeat this stage while Guardian of Azkaban is in play. If this stage is defeated and Guardian of Azkaban is not in play, the players have won the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck, and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 Mountain Troll (if one is not already in play), and place it in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Players cannot defeat this stage while any Mountain Troll cards are in play.

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck each quest phase. Do not make engagement checks during the encounter phase. (Each player may still optionally engage 1 enemy each encounter phase.)

property.name: Engagement Cost
property.value:
When Revealed: Reveal 2 encounter cards per player, and add them to the staging area.
Skip the staging step of the quest phase for the remainder of the game.
Once there are no enemies in play, the players have won the game.
